name: Decaying West
description:
Decaying West is a furious bitemap in the Russian realities. Inspired by a symbiosis of nostalgia for the old games and a view from the window of our studio!
Immerse yourself in the atmosphere of a continuous action in the process of surviving on the streets of a typical Russian city. Become the authority of your region and the pride of an entire nation.
Remember only one thing: "If a fight is inevitable, then you must beat first" - this commandment will help you save the ruler of Russia and the Motherland from the machinations of the fifth column.

Features:
- Various references to reality
- Memes
- More memes
- 4 heroes
- A lot of special techniques
- Improvement of the character
- Full support for the gamepad
